amendment.description: To provide for future project authorizations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 907 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 907 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Brown. (consideration: CR S3401-3408; text: CR S3407-3408) To provide for future project authorizations.
